jobDescription: As a Technical Database Engineer, your primary responsibility would be to design, implement, and maintain database systems. You would work closely with software developers, system administrators, and other stakeholders to ensure that database systems are designed and deployed in a way that maximizes performance, scalability, and reliability.
responsibility: Designing database both relational and non relational.Guiding and supervising all the assistant and sub-assistant engineers at his disposal. He will also report on daily basis to the company CEO of the progress of the projects running. Moreover,  he will sort out action plans of next coming projects on regular bass.
experiences: 2 to 3 years experience in any software company in the relevant field

jobDescription: As a Senior Product Designer, your primary responsibility would be to lead the design of products and user experiences. You would work closely with product managers, engineers, and stakeholders to identify user needs and design solutions that meet business objectives while providing an exceptional user experience.
responsibility: Guiding and supervising all the assistant and sub-assistant engineers at his disposal. He will also report on daily basis to the company CEO of the progress of the projects running. Moreover,  he will sort out action plans of next coming projects on regular bass.
experiences: 2 to 4 years experience in any software company in the relevant field

jobDescription: As a Software Engineer, your primary responsibility would be to design, develop, and maintain software systems. You would work closely with other developers, software architects, project managers, and stakeholders to create reliable, scalable, and maintainable software products.
responsibility: Guiding and supervising all the assistant and sub-assistant engineers at his disposal. He will also report on daily basis to the company CEO of the progress of the projects running. Moreover,  he will sort out action plans of next coming projects on regular bass.
educational_requirement: Two to five years experience in the relevant field.
experiences: 2 to 3 years experience in any software company in the relevant field
